item.title: Eurostar services returning to normal after major disruption
item.description: The rail operator says that repairs are now complete, but delays are expected until the end of Wednesday.

item.title: At least 16 killed as Kenya protesters battle police, rights group says
item.description: Thousands of people march across the country against President William Ruto's government.

item.title: Trump says Nato's new 5% defence spending pledge a 'big win'
item.description: Nato leaders meeting in The Hague say they have an "ironclad commitment to collective defence".

item.title: Watch: BBC's Lyse Doucet reports from Iran on the ceasefire with Israel
item.description: Lyse Doucet reports from the streets of Tehran, where she says things are staring to return to normal.

item.title: Damaged or destroyed - how much does leaked US report on Iran's nuclear sites tell us?
item.description: Fordo is probably the most spied-on place on the planet - and work to understand what is happening there is set to intensify further.
